seo.title: Miejsca na Instagram w Positano (bez tłumów)
seo.description: Zdjęcia bez tłumów: najlepsze miejscówki i pory dnia dla spokojnych kadrów.

linkLabel: Miejsca na Instagram w Positano (bez tłumów)

sections.title: Golden hour setups
body: Grab a spot on the Via Cristoforo Colombo benches about 45 minutes before sunset; the sun drops behind the Li Galli islands in summer.

sections.title: Photo etiquette
body: Keep tripods compact and step aside once you’ve taken a frame so staircases stay passable.

tips: Save your favourite angles offline in Google Maps; reception can dip on terraces and trails.

faqs.q: Is sunrise or sunset better for photos?
Can I pose on hotel terraces if I am not a guest?

items.title: Spiaggia Grande
items.description: Arrive at sunrise for empty docks and calm water; avoid mid‑morning queues.

items.title: Chiesa Nuova terraces
items.description: Golden hour over Fornillo; minimal crowds and a short walk from the hostel.

sunset.heading: Sunset choices
paragraphs: If you prefer beach silhouettes, arrive 30–45 minutes before sunset at Fornillo.

etiquette.heading: Etiquette & local tips
items: Don’t block narrow stairs or roads; take the shot and step aside.
Use a small tripod off‑peak; avoid busy paths in midday.

items.summary: What’s the best time for photos?
items.body: Sunrise for emptier scenes; golden hour for warm tones and softer shadows.

drone.summary: Do I need a drone permit?
